title: Riven shouldn't be a Noxian anymore
body:
Saw a cool picture the other day depicting riven as a noxian general. It made me realise the new riven riot created has no real way to get back to noxus.

She is shown to be someone in the process of becoming an ionian, someone who really hates noxus and wants nothing to do with it. She completely turned her back on the empire and blames it for the mistakes of individuals(for her own mistakes too)

Even if riot magically made her realise she wants to be a noxian again it just wouldnt work out. She betrayed her homeland. Her faith that was the only recognisable thing about her is now non-existent. She is not a good commander. She does not understand war nor how the noxian empire functions. She is very gullible. She spends years building up ionian homes instead of wandering and learning about the world. Thus when she would return to noxus she would have no real knowledge of the outside world. She would be worthless to noxus, a traitor or a mere puppet 

But even if magically noxus embraced her return it would be quite hilarious seeing riven lecture swain or darius on how the empire or the military should be run. She has her fancy imaginary ideas while the others bled for noxus and literally went through hell for it. They worked their ass off to make noxus better and keep it from falling apart. Theres no way that would work out

Riven, as she is should be an ionian, a disillusioned soldier who found a new life. The other part of her old lore wouldnt work out anymore.

Thoughts?

Riven isn't Noxian anymore, in the same way that Xin Zhao isn't Ionian anymore. They may originate from those regions, but giving up their past lives to live for the greater good of their new homes has shifted them both to their new region.

Riven was seduced by Noxian ideals, she believed in their dream and standards of might makes right and the strong deserve power. However she didn't quiet realize what that entailed, how for the strong to rise its usually on a mountain of corpses. When she saw the savagery of the Noxian High Command and the lengths they were willing to go to for victory (friendly fire, chemical weapons, etc...) she became disillusioned with the "Noxian Dream." She believed in the honourable gladiatorial Noxus not a Noxus that exists to grind everyone else under their boot. 

When Riven realized this her whole sense of self worth was shattered and she deserted the Noxian army. She lived for that whole ideal and built herself up to be a weapon of Noxus, she based her whole identity on it, so she wound up what is essentially a broken slate after it happened. She's becoming a born again Ionian trying to reforge her sense of self and her honor
